name: Agent Googar
description:
Agent Garry Googar has been turned into a baby by his boss at the time agency, sent to destroy a deadly crack in time situated at a retirement home in 2022. He enters with only his mission, a gun, and a nappy.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
Mouse 1 - Shoot
Mouse 2 - Time Shift

CREDITS

Programming by Sam Glancey

Design by Harry Stott and Sam Glancey

Art by Miguel Field and Angelina Lewis

Music by Rexland (And from Ben Sound)
